results.title: A case of anaphylaxis to peppermint
results.text_hl: His past medical history was remarkable for @DISEASE_Hypercholesterolemia @DISEASE_MESH:D006937 @@@hypercholesterolemia@@@, @DISEASE_Gastroesophageal_Reflux @DISEASE_MESH:D005764 @@@gastroesophageal reflux@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Gout</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006073 @@@gout@@@. He was on @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Omeprazole @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009853 @@@omeprazole@@@, @CHEMICAL_Aspirin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001241 @@@aspirin@@@, and was carrying a self-injectable @CHEMICAL_Epinephrine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004837 @@@epinephrine@@@ device.

citations.NLM: Bayat R, Borici-Mazi R. A case of anaphylaxis to peppermint Allergy Asthma Clin Immunol. 2014 Jan 28;10(1):6. PMID: 24472564
citations.BibTeX: @article{24472564, title={A case of anaphylaxis to peppermint}, author={Bayat R and Borici-Mazi R}, journal={Allergy Asthma Clin Immunol}, volume={10}, number={1}, pages={6}}
